original_title: Major reshuffle in Sri Lanka Police: New DIG in charge of CID
original_body_lines: The Deputy Inspector General of Police (DIG) in charge of the Criminal Investigations Department (CID), DIG Rohan Premaratne has been transferred to serve as the DIG of Western Province (North).
Meanwhile, DIG P. Ampavila has been transferred to the CID Range to serve as its new DIG.
